channel.title: How do you link forums accounts with in-game accounts?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering if it was possible to basically link forum accounts with in-game accounts. I know CSS, and HTML. I am okay with JavaScript and php. I am using smf (Simple Machines Forums) for my forum. So when someone creates an account on the forum, the same username and password they created it with, automatically is created as a character in the game too.
Thanks, Ian1045 :)
